name: Twilight Memoria
description:
Twilight Memoria Sun and Moon is a RPG game where you play as two kid living their daily life in the setting of fantasy full of monsters. The kids are Rucifar Demien, the son of famous adventurer in the village, and Luna Silver the prodigy child in alchemy. The boy is the fighter type, while the girl is the support type, the boy is stupid, while the girl is weak, the boy's forte is the girl's weakness, and vice versa. In short, they complete each other. While they are just two kids in a peripheral village, they just not playing around the village, but they also helping people through request gathered by the village's chief, and teaching each other to cover one weaknesses.



Relieve your childhood with this heartwarming game and fill your oldest wooden sword memory as Rucifar! Make your dream comes true to have sweet girl beside you all the time which is Luna! Recall the moment of your puberty when you fall in love for the first time, and how you face this new world of romance. Explore the mystery that happened in the village, and prove to the adult your worth as a kid!
